name: Weight Lifter - Addictive Game
description:
Tap your way to become a champion, to become the fastest. It takes effort. It takes strength. And it takes stamina.

How strong are you? Here's your chance to prove your strength in the weightlifting arena. Can you power lift? This sports game is fun to play and can be hard if your fingers get a little stiff.

Easy game play. Simple enough for children. Hours of fun. Get you friends to play as well and see if you can beat their strength score.
This is good athletics enjoyment even if you have never tried weightlifting before.
